name: Conjurer's Duel
description:
This is a magic arena where two wizards (conjurers) meet to fight each other for a glory! They can only use mystic, green gems for summoning magic missiles and for shield which can protect them from those missiles.

The only one can enter next arena level.

This game participating in a Game Maker 2 jam. Included GM2 project file and installer for those who just want to see the game.
